data.question: What is the role of formate in the construction of HHU-8?
data.answer: Formate participates in building SBU-3 and SBU-5.

data.question: What is the crystal system of HHU-7?
Does HHU-8s exhibit a type-I isotherm for N2 adsorption?
data.answer: Yes, HHU-8s exhibits a type-I isotherm for N2 adsorption.

data.question: What is the role of dimethylammonium in HHU-8?
data.answer: Dimethylammonium is needed to neutralize the negative charge of the framework.

data.question: What is the crystal system of HHU-8s?
Is HHU-8s more stable than HHU-8?
data.answer: Yes, HHU-8s is more stable than HHU-8.

data.question: What is the role of acetate in the formation of HHU-8s?
data.answer: Acetate ligand bridges two paddle-wheel Zn clusters in SBU-3s of HHU-8s.
